required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics and Safety in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Pharmacokinetics and Safety of BI 695501 in Healthy Subjects: a Randomized, Double-blind, Single Dose, Parallel-arm, Active Comparator Clinical Phase I Study

brief_summary.textblock: Investigate the pharmacokinetics, safety and tolerability of BI695501 and to establish pharmacokinetic similarity of BI 695501 to adalimumab.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration time curve from time zero to infinity (AUC0-8)
Area under the concentration time curve from time zero to last measurable concentration (AUC0-tz)

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration time curve
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 168 hours post sc injection

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration time curve
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 312 hours post sc injection

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration time curve
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 480 hours post sc injection

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration time curve
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 648 hours post sc injection

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration time curve
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 1032 hours post sc injection.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number (proportion) of subjects with drug related adverse events

arm_group.description: Subject to receive one subcutaneous (s.c.) injection from a prefilled syringe containing BI 695501
Subject to receive one subcutaneous (s.c.) injection from a prefilled syringe containing adalimumab-EU source
Subject to receive one subcutaneous (s.c.) injection from a prefilled syringe containing adalimumab-US source
